# Overflow ellipsis



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Overflow Ellipsis component displays an affordance for selecting elements that have been truncated.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Determines if the component is displayed in its active state. | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                        |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Passes custom content to display as an affordance. |
